name: iplayer-web-a11y-tests
description: Uses bbc-a11y to run automated tests around accessibility on the iPlayer website

scripts.start:bbc-a11y: npm run build:bbc-a11y && bbc-a11y && npm run clean:bbc-a11y
scripts.start:bbc-a11y:interactive: npm run build:bbc-a11y && bbc-a11y --interactive && npm run clean:bbc-a11y
scripts.start:bbc-a11y:junit: npm run build:bbc-a11y && bbc-a11y --reporter ./lib/junit-reporter.js && npm run clean:bbc-a11y
scripts.start:bbc-a11y:ci: npm run build:bbc-a11y && bash -c "docker run --rm --tty --volume $PWD:/ws wildlyinaccurate/bbc-a11y-docker --config /ws/a11y.js --reporter /ws/lib/junit-reporter.js; exit 0;" && npm run clean:bbc-a11y

author: Andy Smith
